verbose_text: Conversely, the liver X receptor (LXR) family of transcription factors is activated in cases of cholesterol excess and decreases cellular cholesterol by upregulating efflux and decreasing synthesis and uptake (XREF_FIG b) [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: liver X receptor (LXR) family of transcription factors is activated in cases of cholesterol excess and decreases cellular cholesterol
